gw.pl.logging

Class MDCUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.pl.logging.MDCUtils

  • public final class MDCUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    MDC tags usable for log message patterns.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String MDC_SERVER
      Deprecated. 
      Not needed. Use ${gw:serverId} in log4j2.xml to display server id.
      static java.lang.String MDC_SESSION
      MDC tag for current HTTP session key.
      static java.lang.String MDC_USER
      MDC tag for current user.
      static java.lang.String MDC_USERID
      MDC tag for current user id.
      static java.lang.String MDC_USERNAME
      MDC tag for current user display name.
